subject: Boxing
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The most lucrative fight in boxing history pits a stealthy, counterpunching mastermind in Mayweather against a spry, enigmatic predator in Pacquiao.
snippet: The most lucrative fight in boxing history pits a stealthy, counterpunching mastermind in Mayweather against a spry, enigmatic predator in Pacquiao.
